A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I enjoyed the last Jedi\, so far it's pretty much on par with force awakens\, need a second viewing to really decide though where it lands in terms of ranking. The only thing I really didn't like was the forced inclusion of those annoying\, pointless\, money grabbing furball characters. They did nothing but annoy me and take me out of the film. ⚠️🛑⚠️🛑⚠️🛑⚠️🛑⚠️🛑 SPOILERS AHEAD !!!!!!!! 🛑⚠️🛑⚠️🛑⚠️🛑⚠️🛑⚠️ Also it was a bummer that the purple hair lady died\, thought the character would have been good to keep around. Honestly thought Leia was going to take her place as the sacrifice to save the fleet. Either way it wasn't a real gripe for me. I thought there were way more awesome parts to the film than bad ones. Fin kicked butt\, the major lightsaber fight scene\, awesome... Luke's standoff\, awesome... Leia\, awesome... kylo taking over as emperor\, pretty badass... very end scene reveal\, you take that broom kid!
